content.prompt: Which of the following was a main purpose of Ateawanto in his speech?

choices.label: To establish commerce between his people and the English
To form an alliance between his people and the French
To seek his people’s freedom from French oppression
To protect his people’s land from English colonizers

topic.text: 2.5: Interactions Between American Indians and Europeans

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
